tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PropertyImages (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT NOT NULL,
  image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  added_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FloorPlans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  floor_number INT,
  image_url TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES Properties(id)
);

CREATE TABLE InspectionReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
  inspection_date DATE,
  report_url TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES Properties(id)
);

CREATE TABLE properties (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    property_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT,
    document_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE property_images (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES properties(id),
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE property_documents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES properties(id),
    document_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    uploaded_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    property_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES properties(id),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    inspection_report_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InspectionReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE,
  report_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES PropertyImages(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyDocuments (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  document_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES PropertyImages(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyMetadata (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  property_address TEXT,
  property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  property_size_sqft INT,
  property_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);
